items.name: Exótico

items.translatedDescription: Corozo, tamarind and lychee

items.name: Alegría
items.description: Zumos de gulupa, mango, maracuyá y piña
items.translatedDescription: Passion fruit (gulupa), mango, passion fruit (maracuyá) and pineapple juices

items.name: Vitalidad
items.description: Zumo de frutas del campo: banano, pera, fresa y hierbabuena.
items.translatedDescription: Country fruit juice: banana, pear, strawberry and spearmint.

items.name: Elixir
items.description: Batido de acaí y banano.
items.translatedDescription: Acai and banana smoothie.

items.name: Fortaleza
items.description: Batido de agraz silvestre, mango y maracuyá
items.translatedDescription: Wild agraz, mango and passion fruit (maracuyá) smoothie

items.name: Sosegado
items.description: Batido de frutos del bosque de la granja.
items.translatedDescription: Farm forest fruits smoothie.

items.name: Arequipe y Limón Mandarino
items.translatedName: Dulce de Leche and Tangerine Lemon

items.name: Albahaca y Limonaria
items.description: Con helado de vainilla y zumo de limón
items.translatedDescription: With vanilla ice cream and lemon juice

items.name: Té Lipton®
items.description: Original o Durazno
items.translatedDescription: Original or Peach

items.name: Té Helado
items.description: Mr. Tea Limón o Durazno
items.translatedDescription: Mr. Tea Lemon or Peach

items.name: Trece Pasos IPA
items.description: Indian Pale Ale. País de origen: Colombia
items.translatedDescription: Indian Pale Ale. Country of origin: Colombia

items.name: Crepe de Queso y Champiñones
items.description: Dos crepes de queso y salsa de champiñones con dip de queso azul y pan árabe.
items.translatedDescription: Two cheese crepes and mushroom sauce with blue cheese dip and pita bread.

items.name: Ensalada de la Barra
items.description: Variedad de lechugas frescas, aguacate, tomate cherry, palmitos del Putumayo, champiñones, queso parmesano y vinagreta de la casa.
items.translatedDescription: Variety of fresh lettuce, avocado, cherry tomato, Putumayo hearts of palm, mushrooms, Parmesan cheese, and house vinaigrette.

items.name: Tomatina
items.description: Tomates horneados con aceite de oliva y hierbas aromáticas, un toque de vinagre balsámico, mozzarella de búfala, lechuga y pan artesanal.
items.translatedDescription: Baked tomatoes with olive oil and aromatic herbs, a touch of balsamic vinegar, buffalo mozzarella, lettuce, and artisanal bread.

items.name: Ensalada Cesar & Waffles
items.description: Lechuga romana, croutones, queso parmesano, aderezo Cesar y nuestros Waffles.
items.translatedDescription: Romaine lettuce, croutons, Parmesan cheese, Caesar dressing, and our Waffles.

items.name: Ensalada Griega
items.description: Variedad de lechugas frescas, tomate, pepino, cebolla, aceitunas Kalamata, queso feta y vinagreta de orégano.
items.translatedDescription: Variety of fresh lettuce, tomato, cucumber, onion, Kalamata olives, feta cheese, and oregano vinaigrette.

items.name: Ensalada Caprese
items.description: Mozzarella de búfala, tomates frescos, albahaca, aceite de oliva extra virgen y reducción de vinagre balsámico.
items.translatedDescription: Buffalo mozzarella, fresh tomatoes, basil, extra virgin olive oil, and balsamic vinegar reduction.

items.name: Champiñones al Ajillo
items.description: Champiñones salteados en aceite de oliva con ajo, perejil y un toque de vino blanco. Acompañados de pan árabe.
items.translatedDescription: Mushrooms sautéed in olive oil with garlic, parsley, and a touch of white wine. Served with pita bread.

items.name: Antipasto Especial
items.description: Selección de carnes frías italianas, quesos marinados, aceitunas, alcachofas y pimentones asados. Servido con pan artesanal.
items.translatedDescription: Selection of Italian cold cuts, marinated cheeses, olives, artichokes, and roasted peppers. Served with artisanal bread.

items.name: Ensalada Cala
items.description: Mix de lechugas orgánicas, aguacate, mango, fresas, queso de cabra fresco, nueces y aderezo de maracuyá.
items.translatedDescription: Mix of organic lettuce, avocado, mango, strawberries, fresh goat cheese, walnuts, and passion fruit (maracuyá) dressing.

items.name: Soy Otoño
items.description: Crema de ahuyama con jengibre y semillas de girasol.
items.translatedDescription: Pumpkin cream soup with ginger and sunflower seeds.

items.name: Vida en Verdes
items.description: Crema de espinacas y kale con un toque de nuez moscada.
items.translatedDescription: Spinach and kale cream soup with a touch of nutmeg.

items.name: Primavera
items.description: Sopa de tomate y albahaca con crutones de queso parmesano.
items.translatedDescription: Tomato and basil soup with Parmesan cheese croutons.

items.name: Sopa del Sol
items.description: Sopa de tortilla mexicana con pollo desmechado, aguacate, queso fresco, crema agria y un toque de chile pasilla.
items.translatedDescription: Mexican tortilla soup with shredded chicken, avocado, fresh cheese, sour cream, and a touch of pasilla chili.

items.name: Lentejas Campesinas
items.description: Guiso de lentejas con chorizo español, papa, zanahoria y un toque de comino. Servidas con arroz blanco.
items.translatedDescription: Lentil stew with Spanish chorizo, potato, carrot, and a touch of cumin. Served with white rice.

items.name: Espinaca Gratinada
items.description: Espinacas frescas salteadas con cebolla, crema de leche y queso parmesano, gratinadas al horno.
items.translatedDescription: Fresh spinach sautéed with onion, heavy cream, and Parmesan cheese, oven-gratinéed.

items.name: Covarachia
items.description: Cazuela de fríjoles rojos con carne desmechada, chorizo, chicharrón, plátano maduro, aguacate, maíz tierno y hogao. Acompañada de arroz y arepa.
items.translatedDescription: Red bean casserole with shredded beef, chorizo, pork crackling, ripe plantain, avocado, sweet corn, and hogao. Served with rice and arepa.

items.name: Mexicana con Pollo
items.description: Pollo desmechado con salsa de chipotle, crema agria, queso, aguacate y pico de gallo.
items.translatedDescription: Shredded chicken with chipotle sauce, sour cream, cheese, avocado, and pico de gallo.

items.name: Pollo, Alcachofa, Queso y Salsa de Queso
items.translatedName: Chicken, Artichoke, Cheese and Cheese Sauce

items.name: Pollo Chipotle
items.description: Pollo desmechado, cebolla caramelizada, aguacate, pico de gallo, queso, maiz y crema de chipotle.
items.translatedDescription: Shredded chicken, caramelized onion, avocado, pico de gallo, cheese, corn, and chipotle cream.

items.name: Pollo en Salsa Verde Mexicana
items.description: Pollo en salsa de tomatillo verde, cebolla, cilantro, aguacate, crema agria, pimentón asado y queso fresco.
items.translatedDescription: Chicken in green tomatillo sauce, onion, cilantro, avocado, sour cream, roasted pepper, and fresh cheese.

items.name: Pollo Rosarito
items.description: Pollo en salsa mexicana con chipotle, lascas de aguacate y frijol rojo.
items.translatedDescription: Chicken in Mexican sauce with chipotle, avocado slices, and red beans.

items.name: Pollo al Curry al estilo Hindú
items.description: Con leche de coco, almendras y chutney de mango.
items.translatedDescription: With coconut milk, almonds, and mango chutney.

items.name: Pollo Trufa Mexicana
items.description: Pollo con salsa de trufa, huitlacoche, aguacate y salsa de tomatillo.
items.translatedDescription: Chicken with truffle sauce, huitlacoche, avocado, and tomatillo sauce.

items.name: Pollo Peruano
items.description: Típica preparación de ají de gallina limeño, salsa de aceitunas y huevo cocido. Con papas al vapor.
items.translatedDescription: Typical Lima-style aji de gallina preparation, olive sauce, and boiled egg. With steamed potatoes.

items.name: Pollo Mexicano
items.description: Pollo, pimentón, cebolla y chipotle, queso rallado, lechuga, crema agria, frijol y pico de gallo.
items.translatedDescription: Chicken, bell pepper, onion and chipotle, grated cheese, lettuce, sour cream, beans and pico de gallo.

items.name: Thai
items.description: Pechuga de pollo en salsa de maní y curry rojo con champiñones, pimentón, cebolla y cilantro. Acompañado de arroz a base de curry y maracuyá.
items.translatedDescription: Chicken breast in peanut and red curry sauce with mushrooms, bell pepper, onion, and cilantro. Served with curry and passion fruit rice.

items.name: Pollo al Ají Panka
items.description: Ají panka originario de los Andes del Perú. Puré de frijol al cilantro, aguacate, rúgula, champiñones de paris y cebolla roja.
items.translatedDescription: Aji panka originating from the Peruvian Andes. Cilantro bean puree, avocado, arugula, paris mushrooms, and red onion.

items.name: Stroganoff
items.description: Lomo de res en salsa de champiñones, tocineta, pepinillos y crema agria.
items.translatedDescription: Beef tenderloin in mushroom sauce, bacon, pickles, and sour cream.

items.name: Roastbeef
items.description: Finas lonjas de roastbeef con mostaza dijon, rúgula, champiñones y tomate cherry. Aderezado con aceite de oliva y reducción balsámica.
items.translatedDescription: Thin slices of roast beef with Dijon mustard, arugula, mushrooms, and cherry tomato. Drizzled with olive oil and balsamic reduction.

items.name: Pavo Desmechado
items.description: Pavo desmechado en salsa bechamel con champiñones y espárragos.
items.translatedDescription: Shredded turkey in bechamel sauce with mushrooms and asparagus.

items.name: Lomito Pimienta
items.description: Lomo fino en salsa de pimienta negra con un toque de brandy.
items.translatedDescription: Tenderloin in black pepper sauce with a touch of brandy.

items.name: Lomito Pizzaïola
items.description: Lomo fino en salsa napolitana con orégano, alcaparras y aceitunas.
items.translatedDescription: Tenderloin in Neapolitan sauce with oregano, capers, and olives.

items.name: Lomito Árabe
items.description: Lomo fino marinado en especias árabes, con tahine, hummus y pan árabe.
items.translatedDescription: Tenderloin marinated in Arabic spices, with tahini, hummus, and pita bread.

items.name: Atún, Queso, Tomate Cherry y Salsa Dijonnaise
items.translatedName: Tuna, Cheese, Cherry Tomato and Dijonnaise Sauce

items.name: Sensación
items.description: Queso mozzarella, tomate seco, rúgula y reducción balsámica.
items.translatedDescription: Mozzarella cheese, sun-dried tomato, arugula, and balsamic reduction.

items.name: Sensación Colombia
items.description: Carne desmechada, hogao, maíz tierno, crema agria y costra tradicional.
items.translatedDescription: Shredded beef, hogao, sweet corn, sour cream, and traditional crust.

items.name: Bretonne
items.description: Manzana caramelizada, queso brie y nueces.
items.translatedDescription: Caramelized apple, brie cheese, and walnuts.

items.name: Bretonne Serrano
items.description: Jamón serrano, manzana caramelizada, queso brie y nueces.
items.translatedDescription: Serrano ham, caramelized apple, brie cheese, and walnuts.

items.name: French Connection
items.description: Queso emmental, jamón ahumado, cebollas caramelizadas, tomate seco y mostaza antigua.
items.translatedDescription: Emmental cheese, smoked ham, caramelized onions, sun-dried tomato, and old-style mustard.

items.name: Palmitos
items.description: Del Putumayo al Ajillo o en Salsa de la Casa (Marco Polo).
items.translatedDescription: From Putumayo, garlic style or in House Sauce (Marco Polo).

items.name: Camarones
items.description: Al Curry, al Ajillo o en Salsa de la Casa (Marco Polo).
items.translatedDescription: Curry, garlic style or in House Sauce (Marco Polo).
items.notes: Garlic version also in Panne Cook

items.name: Camarones con Espinaca
items.description: Camarones salteados con espinaca, ajo y un toque de crema.
items.translatedDescription: Shrimp sautéed with spinach, garlic, and a touch of cream.

items.name: Atún en Salsa de la Casa (Marco Polo)
Mar y Tierra
items.description: Lomo fino y camarones en salsa de la casa con champiñones.
items.translatedDescription: Tenderloin and shrimp in house sauce with mushrooms.

items.name: Camarones Rosarito
items.description: Camarones en salsa mexicana con chipotle, lascas de aguacate y frijol rojo.
items.translatedDescription: Shrimp in Mexican sauce with chipotle, avocado slices, and red beans.

items.name: Salmón del Pacífico
items.description: Filete de salmón ahumado, queso crema, alcaparras, cebolla roja y eneldo.
items.translatedDescription: Smoked salmon fillet, cream cheese, capers, red onion, and dill.

items.name: Salmón Rosado
items.description: Filete de salmón ahumado.
items.translatedDescription: Smoked salmon fillet.

items.name: Volcán del Caribe
items.description: Frutos del mar salteados con pimentón, cebolla, ajo y un toque de ron. Servido en una cama de puré de plátano maduro.
items.translatedDescription: Sautéed seafood with bell pepper, onion, garlic, and a touch of rum. Served on a bed of mashed ripe plantain.

items.description: Crepe de camarones y calamares en su tinta, langostinos y calamares, crema de ají amarillo, crocante de plátano y coral de remolacha.
items.translatedDescription: Shrimp and squid crepe in its ink, prawns and squid, yellow chili cream, crispy plantain, and beetroot coral.

items.name: Camarones al Ají Panka
items.description: Ají panka originario de los Andes del Perú. Con puré de fríjol al cilantro, aguacate, rúgula, champiñones de París y cebolla roja.
items.translatedDescription: Aji panka originating from the Peruvian Andes. With cilantro bean puree, avocado, arugula, Paris mushrooms, and red onion.

Sicilia

items.translatedDescription: Eggplant, zucchini, roasted bell pepper, cherry tomato, mozzarella cheese, and Neapolitan sauce.

items.name: Natura
items.description: Champiñones, espárragos, alcachofas, tomate seco y salsa blanca.
items.translatedDescription: Mushrooms, asparagus, artichokes, sun-dried tomato, and white sauce.

items.name: Napolitana
items.description: Queso mozzarella, salsa napolitana y albahaca.
items.translatedDescription: Mozzarella cheese, Neapolitan sauce, and basil.

items.name: Toscana
items.description: Queso de cabra, espinacas, tomate seco y nueces.
items.translatedDescription: Goat cheese, spinach, sun-dried tomato, and walnuts.

items.name: Parmesana
items.description: Berenjena asada con salsa pomodoro, queso parmesano y albahaca.
items.translatedDescription: Roasted eggplant with pomodoro sauce, Parmesan cheese, and basil.

items.name: Primavera Vegetariana

items.name: Caprino
items.description: Queso de cabra, peras caramelizadas, nueces y reducción balsámica.
items.translatedDescription: Goat cheese, caramelized pears, walnuts, and balsamic reduction.

items.name: Espinaca, Queso Feta y Champiñones Glaseados
items.translatedName: Spinach, Feta Cheese and Glazed Mushrooms

items.name: Ensalada Thai Beef Salad
items.description: Tiras de lomo de res marinado en soya y jengibre, mix de lechugas, pepino, tomate cherry, maní tostado y aderezo thai.
items.translatedDescription: Strips of beef tenderloin marinated in soy and ginger, mixed greens, cucumber, cherry tomato, toasted peanuts, and Thai dressing.

items.name: César
items.description: Con pollo: $28.900, Con salmón ahumado: $31.900
items.translatedDescription: With chicken: $28.900, With smoked salmon: $31.900

items.name: Griega
items.description: Misma que en Entradas
items.translatedDescription: Same as in Appetizers

items.name: Thai
items.description: Mix de lechugas, pollo al curry con leche de coco, mango, pimentón, cebolla roja, maní y aderezo de cilantro.
items.translatedDescription: Mixed greens, curried chicken with coconut milk, mango, bell pepper, red onion, peanuts, and cilantro dressing.

items.name: Mediterránea
items.description: Mix de lechugas, camarones al ajillo, calamares apanados, aceitunas kalamata, tomate cherry, pepino y vinagreta de limón y orégano.
items.translatedDescription: Mixed greens, garlic shrimp, breaded calamari, Kalamata olives, cherry tomato, cucumber, and lemon-oregano vinaigrette.

items.description: Mix de lechugas, queso costeño asado, aguacate, tomate cherry, maíz tierno, plátano maduro en trozos y vinagreta de suero costeño.
items.translatedDescription: Mixed greens, grilled costeño cheese, avocado, cherry tomato, sweet corn, ripe plantain pieces, and costeño buttermilk vinaigrette.

items.name: Homenaje
items.description: Mix de lechugas, jamón serrano, queso de cabra, higos caramelizados, nueces y vinagreta balsámica.
items.translatedDescription: Mixed greens, serrano ham, goat cheese, caramelized figs, walnuts, and balsamic vinaigrette.

items.name: Lama Salad
items.description: Mix de lechugas, salmón ahumado, aguacate, queso crema, alcaparras, cebolla roja y aderezo de eneldo.
items.translatedDescription: Mixed greens, smoked salmon, avocado, cream cheese, capers, red onion, and dill dressing.

items.name: Gran Camarón
items.description: Lechuga romana, camarones jumbo a la parrilla, aguacate, tomate cherry, maíz tierno y aderezo cremoso de chipotle.
items.translatedDescription: Romaine lettuce, grilled jumbo shrimp, avocado, cherry tomato, sweet corn, and creamy chipotle dressing.

items.name: Valparaíso
items.description: Mix de lechugas, pulpo a la parrilla, camarones, calamares, pimentón asado, aceitunas y vinagreta de pimentón ahumado.
items.translatedDescription: Mixed greens, grilled octopus, shrimp, calamari, roasted bell pepper, olives, and smoked paprika vinaigrette.

items.name: Mozzarella
items.description: Mozzarella de búfala fresca, variedad de tomates heirloom, rúgula, pesto de albahaca y reducción balsámica.
items.translatedDescription: Fresh buffalo mozzarella, variety of heirloom tomatoes, arugula, basil pesto, and balsamic reduction.

items.name: Portofino

items.translatedDescription: Mixed greens, sesame-crusted seared tuna, hard-boiled egg, green beans, potato, cherry tomato, olives, and Dijon mustard vinaigrette.

items.name: Emiliana de Quesos
items.description: Mix de lechugas, queso azul, queso brie, queso parmesano, nueces caramelizadas, peras y vinagreta de miel mostaza.
items.translatedDescription: Mixed greens, blue cheese, brie cheese, Parmesan cheese, caramelized walnuts, pears, and honey-mustard vinaigrette.

items.name: Roastbeef Salad
items.description: Finas lonjas de roastbeef, mix de lechugas, champiñones, tomate cherry, queso parmesano y vinagreta de mostaza antigua.
items.translatedDescription: Thin slices of roast beef, mixed greens, mushrooms, cherry tomato, Parmesan cheese, and old-style mustard vinaigrette.

items.name: Trucha Ahumada
items.description: Trucha ahumada desmenuzada, mix de lechugas, aguacate, tomate cherry, huevo duro y aderezo de alcaparras.
items.translatedDescription: Shredded smoked trout, mixed greens, avocado, cherry tomato, hard-boiled egg, and caper dressing.

items.name: Crepe Sombrero Vueltiao Vegan
items.description: Plátano maduro, hogao vegano, aguacate y frijol negro.
items.translatedDescription: Ripe plantain, vegan hogao, avocado, and black beans.

items.name: Sopa Covarachia Vegana
items.description: Sopa de frijoles rojos con tofu ahumado, plátano maduro, aguacate, maíz y hogao vegano.
items.translatedDescription: Red bean soup with smoked tofu, ripe plantain, avocado, corn, and vegan hogao.

items.description: Champiñones, espárragos, alcachofas y pimentón en salsa blanca vegana.
items.translatedDescription: Mushrooms, asparagus, artichokes, and bell pepper in vegan white sauce.

items.name: Pita Árabe
items.description: Falafel, hummus, tahine, ensalada israelí y pan pita.
items.translatedDescription: Falafel, hummus, tahini, Israeli salad, and pita bread.

items.name: Pavo
items.description: Pavo desmechado, lechuga, tomate, pepinillos y salsa de mostaza y miel en pan pita.
items.translatedDescription: Shredded turkey, lettuce, tomato, pickles, and honey mustard sauce in pita bread.

items.name: Doble Pocket
items.description: Doble porción de pollo o pavo con champiñones, queso y salsa bechamel en pan pita.
items.translatedDescription: Double portion of chicken or turkey with mushrooms, cheese, and bechamel sauce in pita bread.

items.name: Popeye Pocket
items.description: Espinacas salteadas con queso feta y nueces en pan pita.
items.translatedDescription: Sautéed spinach with feta cheese and walnuts in pita bread.

items.name: Tuna Pocket
items.description: Atún, maíz tierno, apio, mayonesa ligera y lechuga en pan pita.
items.translatedDescription: Tuna, sweet corn, celery, light mayonnaise, and lettuce in pita bread.

items.name: Mozzarella Pocket
items.description: Queso mozzarella derretido con tomate y albahaca en pan pita.
items.translatedDescription: Melted mozzarella cheese with tomato and basil in pita bread.

items.name: Champiñón Pocket
items.description: Champiñones salteados con ajo y perejil, queso mozzarella en pan pita.
items.translatedDescription: Sautéed mushrooms with garlic and parsley, mozzarella cheese in pita bread.

items.name: Champiñón Pocket con Huevo
items.description: Champiñones salteados con ajo y perejil, huevo y queso mozzarella en pan pita.
items.translatedDescription: Sautéed mushrooms with garlic and parsley, egg, and mozzarella cheese in pita bread.

items.name: Caprese Pocket
items.description: Mozzarella fresca, tomate, albahaca y pesto en pan pita.
items.translatedDescription: Fresh mozzarella, tomato, basil, and pesto in pita bread.

items.name: Opera

items.translatedDescription: Roast beef, provolone cheese, confit cherry tomato, and arugula with old-style mustard sauce in pita bread.

items.name: Siciliana
items.description: Berenjena, zucchini, pimentón asado, queso mozzarella y salsa napolitana en pan pita.
items.translatedDescription: Eggplant, zucchini, roasted bell pepper, mozzarella cheese, and Neapolitan sauce in pita bread.

items.name: Vegetariana
items.description: Hummus, falafel, berenjena asada, pimentón, pepino, lechuga y tomate en pan pita.
items.translatedDescription: Hummus, falafel, roasted eggplant, bell pepper, cucumber, lettuce, and tomato in pita bread.

items.translatedDescription: Grilled chicken, lettuce, tomato, cucumber, red onion, feta cheese, and tzatziki sauce in pita bread.

items.translatedDescription: Waffle with ham, cheese, mixed cheeses, smoked ham, and egg.

items.translatedDescription: Waffle with shredded chicken, cheese, tomato, arugula, and Dijonnaise. Served with arracacha chips.

items.translatedDescription: Waffle with egg, bacon, 7-grain cheese, and costeño buttermilk.

items.translatedDescription: Mini waffle with ham and a touch of ricotta.

items.translatedDescription: Mini yuca waffle with hogao, pancetta, and Paipa cheese.

items.name: Aussie
items.description: (Mini waffles dulces)
items.translatedDescription: (Sweet mini waffles) - Note: Appears miscategorized under Savory Waffles in image

items.name: Banana Caramel
items.description: Crepe relleno de banano caramelizado, helado de vainilla y salsa de caramelo.

items.name: Waffle con Crema Chantilly

items.translatedDescription: Choose three or four different sauces: dulce de leche, chocolate, strawberry, blackberry, English sauce, pineapple, forest fruits, caramel, or guava jelly.

items.translatedDescription: With dulce de leche sauce, banana, Old Style ice cream and whipped cream.

items.translatedDescription: With vanilla ice cream and whipped cream.

items.name: Nutella® y Banano
items.description: Con helado de Old Style y crema chantilly.
items.translatedDescription: With Old Style ice cream and whipped cream.

items.name: Frutos del Bosque
items.description: Con helado Old Style y crema chantilly.
items.translatedDescription: With Old Style ice cream and whipped cream.

items.translatedDescription: Waffle with red berries, vanilla ice cream, a mix of blackberry and strawberry sauces, and whipped cream.

items.name: Chocorrelle
items.description: Waffle de chocolate con crema crunchy de chocolate con avellanas, helado de chocolate y crema chantilly.
items.translatedDescription: Chocolate waffle with crunchy hazelnut chocolate cream, chocolate ice cream, and whipped cream.

items.name: Chocolate

items.translatedDescription: Mini waffle with vanilla ice cream and whipped cream.

items.name: Arequipe

items.translatedDescription: Mini waffle with vanilla ice cream, dulce de leche sauce, and whipped cream.

items.name: Frutas
items.description: Mini waffle con fresas, banano, helado de Vainilla y crema chantilly.
items.translatedDescription: Mini waffle with strawberries, banana, vanilla ice cream, and whipped cream.

items.name: Primavera
items.description: Mini waffle con helado de fresa, salsa de fresa y crema chantilly.
items.translatedDescription: Mini waffle with strawberry ice cream, strawberry sauce, and whipped cream.

items.name: Coffee Caramel
items.description: Mini waffle con helado de café, salsa de caramelo, nueces y crema chantilly.
items.translatedDescription: Mini waffle with coffee ice cream, caramel sauce, walnuts, and whipped cream.

items.name: Nataly
items.description: Mini waffle con helado de vainilla, salsa de chocolate, trozos de chocolate y crema chantilly.
items.translatedDescription: Mini waffle with vanilla ice cream, chocolate sauce, chocolate pieces, and whipped cream.

items.name: Copa Almond Chocolate
items.description: Helado de chocolate, salsa de chocolate, almendras tostadas y crema chantilly.
items.translatedDescription: Chocolate ice cream, chocolate sauce, toasted almonds, and whipped cream.

items.name: Pasión de Chocolate
items.description: Brownie caliente bañado de helado de Chocolate cubierto de concentrado de chocolate y crema chantilly.
items.translatedDescription: Warm brownie bathed in Chocolate ice cream covered with chocolate concentrate and whipped cream.

items.name: Fondue Crepes & Waffles
items.description: Trozos de waffle y crepe, frutas de estación, vainilla, Arequipe, Fresas y Chocolate para untar y crema chantilly.
items.translatedDescription: Pieces of waffle and crepe, seasonal fruits, vanilla, Dulce de Leche, Strawberries and Chocolate for dipping, and whipped cream.

items.name: Copa Vainilla Hot Chocolate
items.description: Helado de vainilla, salsa de chocolate caliente, crema chantilly y chocolate Golosine con el que le puedes dar el gusto a tu gusto.
items.translatedDescription: Vanilla ice cream, hot chocolate sauce, whipped cream, and Golosine chocolate that you can enjoy to your liking.

items.name: Copa Dark Chocolate Fudge
items.description: Helado de chocolate, salsa de chocolate Fudge con trozos de brownie, crema chantilly y barquillo.
items.translatedDescription: Chocolate ice cream, chocolate fudge sauce with brownie pieces, whipped cream, and wafer.

items.name: Tartin de Limón
items.description: Galleta crocante de limón con toques cítricos de limón, naranja y mandarina, helado de limón y merengue italiano, una opción ligera y perfecta para refrescar y disfrutar.
items.translatedDescription: Crispy lemon cookie with citrus notes of lemon, orange, and tangerine, lemon ice cream, and Italian meringue, a light and perfect option to refresh and enjoy.

items.name: Copa Choco Haze
items.description: Fruta aromática del oriente y toda la frescura del helado de Limón, salsa de chocolate y avellanas, merengue crujiente.
items.translatedDescription: Aromatic fruit from the East and all the freshness of Lemon ice cream, chocolate and hazelnut sauce, crispy meringue.

items.name: Copa Rochelle
items.description: Helado de chocolate y vainilla, con crujientes pedazos de avellana, crema chantilly y barquillo.
items.translatedDescription: Chocolate and vanilla ice cream, with crispy hazelnut pieces, whipped cream, and wafer.

items.name: Bosque Nevado
items.description: Helado de Vainilla con salsa de arequipe, frutos del bosque, merenguitos suizos y almendras tostadas.
items.translatedDescription: Vanilla ice cream with dulce de leche sauce, forest fruits, Swiss meringues, and toasted almonds.

items.name: Tiramisú
items.description: Clásica preparación italiana de helado Old Style, bizcochuelo bañado en café y licor, cacao en polvo y crema chantilly.
items.translatedDescription: Classic Italian preparation of Old Style ice cream, ladyfingers dipped in coffee and liqueur, cocoa powder, and whipped cream.

items.name: Copa Vesubio
items.description: Auténtica combinación italiana de helado de Fresa, Vainilla y Limón.
items.translatedDescription: Authentic Italian combination of Strawberry, Vanilla, and Lemon ice cream.

items.name: Saint Honoré
items.description: Profiteroles con helado de vainilla, sobre salsa de chocolate caliente y salsa de caramelo, crema chantilly y almendras.
items.translatedDescription: Profiteroles with vanilla ice cream, over hot chocolate sauce and caramel sauce, whipped cream, and almonds.

items.name: Copa Capri
items.description: La suavidad del helado de Vainilla sobre una crujiente galleta con sabor a coco, bañada en salsa de arequipe, uva y crema chantilly.
items.translatedDescription: The smoothness of Vanilla ice cream on a crispy coconut-flavored cookie, bathed in dulce de leche sauce, grape, and whipped cream.

items.name: Fontana de Trevi
items.description: Sinfonía de sabores de helados de Crujiente, Chocolate, Coffee Caramel y Vainilla, con salsa de chocolate, crocante de nueces y crema chantilly.
items.translatedDescription: Symphony of Crunchy, Chocolate, Coffee Caramel, and Vanilla ice cream flavors, with chocolate sauce, crispy walnuts, and whipped cream.

items.name: Copa Veneciana
items.description: Helado Old Style entre la exquisita composición de licor de sabajón y el sutil sabor de la uva pasa.
items.translatedDescription: Old Style ice cream amidst the exquisite composition of sabajón liqueur and the subtle flavor of raisins.

items.name: Tartufino de Avellana
items.description: Canastilla de chocolate italiano con helado de Avellana o con tu helado favorito, con trocitos de chocolate y nueces, crema chantilly y barquillo.
items.translatedDescription: Italian chocolate basket with Hazelnut ice cream or your favorite ice cream, with chocolate bits and walnuts, whipped cream, and wafer.

items.name: Banana Split
items.description: Clásica mezcla de helado de Vainilla, Fresa y Chocolate. Acompañado de banano, crema chantilly, nueces, salsa de chocolate y arequipe.
items.translatedDescription: Classic mix of Vanilla, Strawberry, and Chocolate ice cream. Served with banana, whipped cream, walnuts, chocolate sauce, and dulce de leche.

items.name: Copa Beverly Hills
items.description: Helado de Vainilla sobre crujiente galleta de mantequilla entre la clásica combinación de las salsas inglesa y uva, con crema chantilly.
items.translatedDescription: Vanilla ice cream on a crispy butter cookie between the classic combination of English and grape sauces, with whipped cream.

items.name: Copa Hawai
items.description: Toda la frescura de nuestros helados de Limón, Mora y Maracuyá con crema chantilly.
items.translatedDescription: All the freshness of our Lemon, Blackberry, and Passion Fruit (Maracuyá) ice creams with whipped cream.
